official_title: A bill to amend section 3 of the Child Nutrition Act of 1966 to permit the participation of nonprofit institutions for handicapped persons in the special milk program.

summary.text: Permits the participation of non- profit institutions for hanicapped persons in the special milk program under the Child Nutrition Act of 1966.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 3 of the Child Nutrition Act of 1966 to permit the participation of nonprofit institutions for handicapped persons in the special milk program.
